document.full_text: the f.b.i. released documents stating that george steinbrenner assisted the agency in two investigations ' one of them apparently a terrorism probe ' in the years leading up to his pardon by president reagan.
document.title: steinbrenner helped f.b.i. before winning pardon
lines_and_colors: the f.b.i. released documents stating that george steinbrenner assisted the agency in two investigations ' one of them apparently a terrorism probe ' in the years leading up to his pardon by president reagan.
